name: Andy Griffith
alma_mater: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
spouse: Barbara Bray Edwards , (m.1949–1972; divorced) , Solica Cassuto , (m.1975–1981; divorced) , Cindi Knight , (m.1983–2012; his death)
